cards.flavor: Tumblewaggs Migrating on Southern Trail-Stampedes Expected
cards.name: Fell the Mighty
cards.text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

cards.flavor: Ambush Justified? Holes in Story, Sheriff Unresolved
cards.name: Fierce Retribution
cards.text:
Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Destroy target [attacking] creature.

cards.flavor: Barkeep Reports Theft of Bottle-Customers Report Theft of Barkeep
cards.name: Journey to Nowhere
cards.text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Leyline Binding
cards.text:
Flash
Domain - This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.
When Leyline Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Leyline Binding leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Hellspurs Announce Job Opening
cards.name: Pariah
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

cards.flavor: Mysterious Visitor Saves Town, Vanishes
cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Heist Shocker! Supposedly Invincible Vault Vinced!
cards.name: Archive Trap
cards.text:
If an opponent searched their library this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target opponent mills thirteen cards.

cards.name: Archmage's Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target spell.
• Target player draws two cards.
• Gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.

cards.flavor: Off the Rails? Serial Train Robber Strikes Again!
cards.name: Commandeer
cards.text:
You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

cards.flavor: Might or Magic? Recent Clash Fuels Debate
cards.name: Essence Capture
cards.text: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

Fighting Fire with Fire Ineffective,
Reports Flammable Wizard

cards.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

cards.flavor: Sheriff Bans Rootin'-Is Tootin' Next?
cards.name: Mindbreak Trap
cards.text:

cards.name: Repulse

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: Rude Rascal Robs Rube's Robes
cards.name: Imp's Mischief
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.

cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: Local Man Defies Death, Morticians Mortified!

cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

cards.flavor: Dead Horse Delivers Beating
cards.name: Surgical Extraction
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

cards.flavor:
Billy, please don't forget to add the headline before sending for publication again.
-Clara
cards.name: Thoughtseize
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Collective Defiance
cards.text:
Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more -
• Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.
• Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature.
• Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Quint-Blaster" Inventor Promises Five Times the Fun
cards.name: Crackle with Power
cards.text: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to each of up to X targets.

cards.flavor: Where There's Thunder, There's Lightning-Blaster Disaster Vaporizes Safety Inspector!
cards.name: Electrodominance
cards.text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

cards.flavor: Notorious Hellspur Comes Out Ahead in Violent Conflict
cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

cards.name: Indomitable Creativity
cards.text: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Maligned Thespian Stares, Hurls Daggers at Disparaging Audience
cards.name: Skewer the Critics
cards.text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Sterling Enforcer Can't Stand Heat, or at All
cards.name: Skullcrack
cards.text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Crack Shot Snipes First Prize in Omenport's "Thunder Trial"
cards.name: Clear Shot
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Force of Vigor
cards.text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.

cards.name: Pest Infestation
cards.text: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments. Create twice X 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

cards.name: Primal Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.

• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Decimate

cards.text:
When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

cards.name: Ionize
cards.text: Counter target spell. Ionize deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.

cards.name: Oko, Thief of Crowns
cards.text:
[+2]: Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
[+1]: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3.
[−5]: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Outlaws' Merriment
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one at random. Create a red and white creature token with those characteristics.
• 3/1 Human Warrior with trample and haste.
• 2/1 Human Cleric with lifelink and haste.
• 1/2 Human Rogue with haste and "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target."

cards.name: Siphon Insight
cards.text:
Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of them face down and put the other on the bottom of that library. You may look at and play the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
Flashback {1}{U}{B}
